The man in white robe is Serizawa Kamo and the man in
black is Niimi Nishiki (VERY suspiciously like Saito
Hajime in RuroKen)

And a much belated Merry Christmas and a Happy New
Year to all ^^ Didn't have access to the Net while I
was in Kobe and am just checking my mails here in
Hiroshima.

Serizawa Kamo

"I am the bone of my sword.
    Steel is my body,and fire is my blood.
  I have created over a thousand blades.
       Unknown to Death.
   Nor known to Life.
Have withstood pain to create many weapons.
     Yet, those hands will never hold anyting.
         So as I pray, unlimited blade works."

                               (Fate/Stay Night)
